args: & { $ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; $pses = Get-Module -ListAvailable PowerShellEditorServices | Select-Object -First 1; if (-not $pses) { Write-Error 'PowerShellEditorServices module not found. Install with Install-Module PowerShellEditorServices'; exit 1 }; $script = Join-Path $pses.ModuleBase 'Start-EditorServices.ps1'; & $script -HostName 'Zed' -HostProfileId 'Zed' -HostVersion '1.0.0' -BundledModulesPath $pses.ModuleBase -EnableConsoleRepl -LogPath (Join-Path $env:TEMP 'pses.log') -SessionDetailsPath (Join-Path $env:TEMP 'pses.session.json') -FeatureFlags @() -Stdio }
